author: Andrea Gonzalez
text: 'I recently called this store to ask about their “puff bars”. They told me their price was $16 (which is completely overpriced
column5: the usual price is $10). They then said that they sell 2 for $25. I then made my way over there. I bought 2 puff bars expecting to pay $25. When I got back home
column6: I checked my transactions and they charged me $32. I called to tell them and they never answered. I then discovered that the puff bars were fake. This is unacceptable and unprofessional. I will be reporting to the Better Business Bureau.'

author: Osborn Focht
text: 'Something for everybody. Lowest price for American Spirits and the service is very friendly.  My favorite corner store.'

author: William Clark
text: 'Really nice shop in beautiful neighborhood. Owner is a really nice guy and the employees  are great. Really nice corner store'

author: Tracey Ausby
text: "It's the pick up spot for ups ground so I had to pickup my packages"
